ai.summary: A gentle 5.9 km lakeside loop around Lough Fea in the UK. The route is suitable for beginners and families, offering calm water views, open meadows and short woodland sections.
ai.terrain_summary: Predominantly flat to gently undulating paths with a mix of compact gravel, grassy shores and occasional muddy patches near the water. Some sections may be uneven and slippery after rain; expect exposed ground with limited shade in open stretches.
ai.safety_notes: Check weather and daylight before you go. Wear sturdy waterproof footwear and bring a light waterproof layer. Stay on marked paths, keep a safe distance from the water's edge, supervise children and dogs, and carry a charged phone with emergency contacts. Be prepared for mud after rain and reduced visibility in mist.
recommended_gear: Map or offline navigation / charged phone with GPS
ai.best_seasons: All year, with particularly pleasant conditions in spring and autumn.

seo.title: Lough Fea – Easy 5.9 km Lakeside Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Explore a gentle 5.9 km lakeside loop around Lough Fea in the UK. Easy terrain, scenic water views, practical safety tips, and gear for a comfortable day hike.
